title: "BLACK UMBRELLA (The Right Stuff)", a bad lip reading of Miley Cyrus

comments.author: angelina acuna

comments.text:
3:30---WHAT is Snoop Dogg doing? He can't have been doing that in the 
original video...could he? It just proves he's brainless.

Does it say something about me that I've discovered a MASSIVE inside joke 
that spans several BLRs? At 1:45, Miley Cyrus sings a line about a braided 
show dog called "Tiny Timmy Tokyo". In the third "Twilight" bad lip 
reading, a friend of Bella's gives her a book about moss (which was edited 
in by BLR). The author is credited to "T. T. Tokyo". Also, at the very 
beginning of the "Michelle Bachmann" video, "T. T. Tokyo" is shown, for a 
split second, to be the cameraman. Check it out.﻿
